unnormalised: Smart meters, eh? Heard mixed reviews from my Chennai folks. Some say bill calculation is faster, like, auto-deduct before Onam celebrations even start! But others complain about accuracy – feels like BSES is selling us overpriced biryani! Heard IIT Delhi is researching better algorithms. Hope they fix the Rs. fluctuations; my neighbor's bill jumped 200% last month even though he barely used AC, it's hardly 30 km to his office!
